content: कौलिक {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (की|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [कुलादागतः ठक्] {@--1@} Belonging to a family. {@--2@} Customary in a family, ancestral. --कः {@--1@} A weaver; कौलिको विष्णुरूपेण राजकन्यां निषेवते <ls>Pt. 1. 202.</ls> {@--2@} An impostor, a heretic. {@--3@} A follower of the left hand Śākta ritual.
